message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. This is a great price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,050,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need at least $1,075,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's find a compromise.

I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I would like to secure this product, I must stick to my budget. I propose $1,060,000 as a counteroffer. This is the highest amount I can afford without compromising other financial commitments.
